channel.title: Energy
channel.description: Hello! I’m trying to add “Energy” to the top right hand corner where the HP and Summoning would be on actual RuneScape. I want it so it goes up and down whenever the character runs/Stops running. Could someone explain to me how I could do this?

item.title: Energy
item.dc:creator: @Top_Glitch Top Glitch
item.description:
@Top_Glitch wrote:

Hello! I’m trying to add “Energy” to the top right hand corner where the HP and Summoning would be on actual RuneScape. I want it so it goes up and down whenever the character runs/Stops running. Could someone explain to me how I could do this?
